   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to AngelBox!
====================

* AngelBox takes docker-compose "to the max" deployed on `Fedora CoreOS <https://docs.fedoraproject.org/en-US/fedora-coreos/>`_. 
* Ready for `RedHat OpenShift Container Platform <https://www.openshift.com/products/container-platform>`_ to take over when scaling.
* Production quality re-imagining of  `DevilBox <http://devilbox.org/>`_ 
* A framework for deploying compositions of docker images to production and staging servers.
* A code-based learning hub for collating knowledge of practical container/docker usage 

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   :glob:

   topics/*
